summary: Inventory management system with RB orders, status tracking, and export functionality
architectural_notes: System tracks order status transitions (ready state)
RB orders support partial fulfillment with quantity splitting
Export functionality includes PDF and JPEG formats with embedded images
known_issues: Status changed to ready incorrectly appearing in ready tab
PDF export not working on iPhone
Design images not included in Karigar tab exports

existing_features.title: For RB orders being marked as ready, prompt the user to enter a supplied quantity. Split the original order line into two separate entries: one with the pending quantity (original qty minus supplied qty) displayed in Total Orders tab, and one with the supplied quantity displayed in Ready Orders tab.
Fix PDF export functionality to work correctly on iPhone devices. Investigate and resolve current PDF generation failures specific to iOS Safari/mobile browsers.

In the Karigar detail page, when exporting orders to PDF or JPEG, automatically include the associated design images in the exported files. Each order's design code should have its corresponding design image embedded in the export.

new_feature_requests.summary: Fix: Status changed to ready incorrectly showing in ready tab
RB orders: Ask for supplied qty and split order lines (pending qty in total orders, supplied qty in ready orders)
Fix: PDF export failing on iPhone
Karigar tab: Attach design image to PDF and JPEG exports
Fix the Ready tab to only display orders with status 'Ready'. Orders with status 'StatusChangedToReady' should not appear in the Ready tab.

projectName: Fix Ready Tab Display, Add RB Order Splitting, and Enhance PDF/JPEG Exports
